TABLE.NAME: local_oevents
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for local_oevents, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: course_ms_ext
TABLE.COMMENT: Extension for adding up the calendar id and onenote section id to course

FIELD.NAME: ms_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Course id/Section id created by office calendar/onenote which is passes to the moodle

FIELD.NAME: ms_type
FIELD.COMMENT: type of the ms_id, to show whether it is calender or onenote
